text: "Live for Now", also known as "Live for Now Moments Anthem", is a 2017 short movie commercial for Pepsi by PepsiCo. It stars Kendall Jenner and the song "Lions" by Skip Marley plays in the background. The mission of the ad according to Pepsi was to promote "unity, peace, and understanding." The advertisement was pulled after it was criticized for not handling police brutality and the Black Lives Matter movement seriously. ==References== Category:Kendall Jenner
title: Live for Now
